channel.title: Npc agressiveness
channel.description: How do I make an npc be more agressive? what i mean is how do i make it hit more damage and so on?

FAil
[/quote][/quote]

Don’t talk.[/quote]

you know wat im sorry for argueing with you.but dont think your the shit,

item.title: Npc agressiveness
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:5, topic:260139”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=343449.msg2652911#msg2652911 date=1233633467]

[quote author=SandScape link=topic=343449.msg2652910#msg2652910 date=1233633307]

[quote author=adamhelloman8 link=topic=343449.msg2652888#msg2652888 date=1233632166]
How do I make an npc be more agressive? what i mean is how do i make it hit more damage and so on?
[/quote]npc.cfg
ok but in npc.cfg im sure hes gonna need to change the hps of a npc to so your wrong fail at that
[/quote] Wrong.

You’re going to have to edit something called randomhit or something in npcHandler. I don’t really know off the top of my head, and i have to go to sleep, but i know it’s not in npc.cfg. So i just figure i’d tell you so you’re not put in the wrong direction.

Gnight.
[/quote][/quote]You failed at quoting… Don’t be a smartass when you don’t know what the hell you’re talking about in the first place. He wanted to know how to change the hitdiff (thanks runefreak for pointing that out) not the hp.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc agressiveness
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:3, topic:260139”][quote author=SandScape link=topic=343449.msg2652910#msg2652910 date=1233633307]

[quote author=adamhelloman8 link=topic=343449.msg2652888#msg2652888 date=1233632166]
How do I make an npc be more agressive? what i mean is how do i make it hit more damage and so on?
[/quote]npc.cfg
ok but in npc.cfg im sure hes gonna need to change the hps of a npc to so your wrong fail at that
[/quote] Wrong.

You’re going to have to edit something called randomhit or something in npcHandler. I don’t really know off the top of my head, and i have to go to sleep, but i know it’s not in npc.cfg. So i just figure i’d tell you so you’re not put in the wrong direction.

Gnight.[/quote]

Read full topic
